title: Web Foundations
description: Learn the core building blocks of the web â€” HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. By the end, you'll build your first responsive website.
learning_objectives: Understand the structure of web pages using HTML.
Style web pages using CSS, including layouts, colors, and typography.
Add interactivity to web pages using JavaScript.
Create responsive designs that work across devices.
Use developer tools to debug and inspect web pages.
Understand the relationship between HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in modern web development.
Build a small, functional website combining all three technologies.
